EmailTemplate.description: PO number is available on Quote/Proposal
EmailTemplate.name: DS CPO Confirmation to Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Nokia customer purchase order acknowledgement: Your reference: {!Apttus_Config2__CustomerPurchaseOrder__c.PO_number__c}/ Nokia reference: {!Apttus_Config2__CustomerPurchaseOrder__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your purchase order.
Nokia acknowledges the receipt of PO No. {!Apttus_Config2__CustomerPurchaseOrder__c.PO_number__c} under Agreement {!Apttus_Config2__CustomerPurchaseOrder__c.Apttus_CMConfig__AgreementId__c} accepted on {!Today}.
Our teams will provide PO confirmation as soon as possible.
